extended_tweet.full_text:
Massive earthquake hit Croatia’s capital #Zagreb this morning during nationwide #coronavirus lockdown. 

People were asked to evacuate their homes. 

It’s 4 degrees Celsius outside & people are scared to be inside or outside. 

Many churches were destroyed.

Photos: Laudato TV https://t.co/iaq70YPmjZ
